title: Pixel Fanart: SCP-4943
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-offices-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:rso]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="addendum"]]

= [[[art-exchange-hub|It is that time of the year,]]] and this time's giftee is [[*user Attila The Pun]]!

= I must admit that I had a lot of fun making my first SCP pixel art, of course, using an uh... Common style, or at least employed pretty often by other people. Anyway, SCP-4943 was certainly a weird and disturbing one from my personal viewpoint, so I decided to head for that one.

= I originally made pixel art for this one twice, but I finally picked on the second design because I liked it way more. Anyway, here it is!

----
[[include component:image-block name=4943.png|align=center|width=70%|caption=SCP-4943 ("Transcendence"), by Attila The Pun.]]
----

= Although I felt that some of the cables or the design didn't fit, or if there's a lack of detail, I still liked it.

= **Merry Christmas!**

= -- //[[*user Abrethe]]// / //[[*user Roundabouts]]//

[[/div]]
